name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: The Tyrannosaurus Rex was one of the largest meat-eating dinosaurs that ever lived.

name: Triceratops
description: The Triceratops is known for its large bony frill and three horns on its face.

name: Velociraptor
description: The Velociraptor was a swift, agile predator that hunted in packs.

name: Brachiosaurus
description: The Brachiosaurus was one of the tallest dinosaurs, known for its long neck.

name: Stegosaurus
description: The Stegosaurus had distinctive plates along its back and a spiked tail.

name: Allosaurus
description: The Allosaurus was a large predator that lived during the Late Jurassic period.

name: Iguanodon
description: The Iguanodon was one of the first dinosaurs to be discovered and named.

name: Spinosaurus
description: The Spinosaurus is known for the sail-like structure on its back.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: The Ankylosaurus was heavily armored and had a large club-like tail.

name: Compsognathus
description: The Compsognathus was a small, agile dinosaur that lived in the Late Jurassic period.
